general_advisory: Strengthen bunds of paddy field, monitor crop for pests, manage insect pest attacks, prevent diseases, provide clean drinking water to poultry, and consult department personnel for disease prevention.

advisory: Regular monitoring of the crop for incidence of pest and diseases should be done.
Apply Cartap hydrocloride 50SP or Fipronil 5 SC after rain.
Survey regularly for insect pest attacks and take action advised by department personnel.
Apply 26 kg urea per acre at 45 days after planting and mulching.
Do not allow water to remain stagnant in the field.
Spray Carbendazim to manage tikka disease.
Avoid waterlogging, drench Carbendazim or Mancozeb near root zone.
Prevent water stagnation near the base of the plant and provide stakings to newly planted saplings.
Manage Thrips population in chilli by spraying Imidachloprid or Dimethoate.
Provide regular feeding at 0.35 of body mass.
Provide clean drinking water to poultry and take preventive action for diseases.
